credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Ripley
title: "Crystal Cypress Tree"
medium: Woven silk (under-cloth); cardboard, ribbon, paper (storage boxes)
description: Circular tan under-cloth (-7a) embroidered with numbered diagram giving positions of glass centerpiece elements laid out to form garden with statuary (1962-150-1/6). Oblong boxes of various sizes(-7b/f), their beige surfaces decorated with an overall block-printed(?) arabesque pattern in red.  Each box having a hinge lid and a pair of tan ribbon ties.
name: Table centerpiece elements
